abstract: By virtually every measure, “Live With Kelly” is faring better so far under Kelly Ripa (with a string of guest co-hosts) than it did at this point last year, when Regis Philbin was by her side.
snippet: By virtually every measure, “Live With Kelly” is faring better so far under Kelly Ripa (with a string of guest co-hosts) than it did at this point last year, when Regis Philbin was by her side.
lead_paragraph: For the moment, at least, the departure of Regis Philbin from his longtime perch in the morning has not sent his former show’s ratings into a tailspin.

headline.main: Without Regis, Kelly Keeps Up Ratings in Morning
